titleInfo.title: Songwriter Session - Writers round; the songs of Eric Church - 2016-02-20

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Performances by songwriters Casey Beathard, Jeff Hyde, Luke Laird and Jeremy Spillman from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on February 20, 2016. Presented in support of the exhibit Eric Church: Inside the Outsider.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
